[TEXT]
<line: 19> Rogers v. Zimmer, Inc. et al
<line: 20> USDC Northern District of Illinois Case No. 16 CV 10634
<line: 21> MDL 2272

[TEXT]
<line: 23> Dear Counselor:

[TEXT]
<line: 25> We hereby acknowledge receipt of the records, which were electronically transferred to our court from the.
<line: 26> USDC Eastern District of North Carolina, Rogers v. Zimmer, Inc. et al (7:16-cv-00368). The case number.
<line: 27> assigned to the above case is 16 CV 10634. The assigned judge to the case is the Honorable Rebecca R..
<line: 28> Pallmeyer.

[TEXT]
<line: 30> The purpose of this letter is to inform you that the MDL Panel has ordered that the above-referenced case
<line: 31> be transferred to the Northern District of lllinois, and the records received from this transfer indicate that you.
<line: 32> are an attorney of record. All future documents filed in this matter should reference the case number and
<line: 33> judge assigned in the Northern District of Illinois.

[TEXT]
<line: 35> For further information, please visit our website address at: www.ilnd.uscourts.gov for the
<line: 36> United States District Court, Northern District of Illinois, Eastern Division to review the General Order
<line: 37> regarding electronic filings, e-filing training , user manual and policies and procedures for registration as an.
<line: 38> efiler in this Court.

[TEXT]
<line: 40> Sincerely yours,

[TEXT]
<line: 42> Thomas G. Bruton, Clerk

[TEXT]
<line: 44> /s/ Melissa Rivera
<line: 45> Deputy Clerk
